Package com.bdowebtech.bargainbuyclub.model

Class Product

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bdowebtech.bargainbuyclub.model.Product
  • public class Product
extends java.lang.Object
    Product class defines product structure and methods to retrieve product price from the product page website.
    Author:
    Martin Dwyer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Product()
      Default constructor creates a null object.
      Product​(java.lang.String productUrl, Store store)
      Constructor to create product from the product page URL address and the store which the product came from.
